# EnchantmentType Class

Contains information on a type of enchantment.

## Properties

### **id**
`read-only id: string;`

The name of the enchantment type.

Type: *string*

### **maxLevel**
`read-only maxLevel: number;`

The maximum level this type of enchantment can have.

Type: *number*
